doc:
Kraig Thornber https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kraig_Thornber 0 Kraig Thornber (born 1961) is a British actor, singer and choreographer best known for playing the handyman Riff Raff in The Rocky Horror Show and Grandpa George in the musical Charlie and the Chocolate Factory. He is a former member of the National Theatre. Kraig_Thornber ( born 1961 ) is a_British_actor_,_singer_and_choreographer best_known for playing the_handyman_Riff_Raff in The_Rocky_Horror_Show and Grandpa_George in the_musical_Charlie and the_Chocolate_Factory . He is a_former_member of the_National_Theatre .
